content:
This two bedroom unit is ideal for families. The suite has a living room with a sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, and three televisions, two bathrooms, and two bedrooms. Available options include: two queen beds, one queen bed and two twin beds, or one king bed and one queen bed. Our Galleria rooms are located in our Town Center which puts you right in the center of the action. Our Town Center houses our indoor waterpark, arcade, movie theater, and bowling alley. Sleeps up to six.

2 Queen Beds & 1 Sofabed OR 1 Queen Bed, 2 Twin Beds & 1 Sofabed OR 1 King Bed & 1 Queen Bed
784 square feet / rate is for 4-6 people, maximum 6

STARTING FROM $198 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge.
